_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.13:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in entering immersion but not in gladdening the mind for immersion
One meditator who is skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion but not in entering immersion
One meditator who is neither skilled in entering immersion nor in gladdening the mind for immersion
One meditator who is skilled in both entering immersion and in gladdening the mind for immersion
